metadata.name: Lecle Members
metadata.description:
Lecle is a global software house with locations in **Korea**, **USA**, **Singapore** and **Vietnam**.

We offer solutions that are best suited to our customers in an environment where diverse cultures and technologies combined.

Founded in 2014, Lecle received an initial investment from The Ventures and went through Plug and Playâ€™s accelerating program.
metadata.criteria: Provide some evidence, we will treat you well
